title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-2.11 - Exits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-2.11 - Exits

State Regulations

At least two exits remote from each other shall be
provided from each floor, tier, room or balcony in structures which house
amusement devices and which are not places of public assembly. No exit shall be
less than 18 inches wide. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
45-2.11

Certain buildings or structures housing amusement
devices may constitute places of public assembly as defined by the Labor Law
and be accordingly subject to the provisions of Part 36 (Rule No. 36), State

Standard Building Code for Places of Public

Assembly. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
